resources.string: "Cast your device's screen to external monitors"
Pull down to access the Control centre, turn on casting, then search for nearby devices.

You can project items from your Xiaomi tablet on most Xiaomi TV models with Bluetooth capabilities without turning on Miracast manually. If you need to turn on Miracast, press the [MENU] button and start casting by using the option for other Android phones.
Cast presentations to your TV while switching slides and checking annotations from your device.
Cast games from your device to your TV.
